string.name: name
string.value: Welcome Back to New Leaf City Day 6

Icebyrd Slimm, the one-man welcome wagon of New Leaf City, is itching to pick your brain. He wants to know how much you've learned about his wonderful city in the three years since it was founded. (6 of 7)
You're in the process of answering Icebyrd's daily question. Return to him and give him the correct answer.
He wants to know how much you've learned about his wonderful city in the three years since it was founded. (6 of 7)

Can you believe it's been three years since my New Leaf City became the talk of the entire Maple World? You've spent most of that time here, of course? Why not try to answer a daily question about my city? C'mon, quizzes are so in right now.
Good! Quizzes are the latest craze, you know. All the cool townies are doing it.
Hrmph! Well, we can't all be trendy, I suppose.

Here's my question of the day.
Under our feet are bricks that serve as the foundation of our marvelous NLC buildings. How many barred windows and drain pipes are between them? Wait, multiply that number by...3! #b#L0#27#l
#L1#30#l
#L2#36#l
#L3#39#l
#L4#42#l
#k
Well done! Glad you can count!
